data.text: The following morning as I sorted through paperwork…

Trainer-san, horrible news!! 
We can't find Curren Chan-san anywhere…
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

data.text:
Rumours of Curren Chan's dissappearance 
quickly spread amongst the students.

Apparently she left a note in her room. 
After receiving it from Tazuna-san I opened it.
I'm going to go on a trip to better myself. I plan on meeting with the legendary Uma Sage in the mountains.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Onee-chan, please don't be mad at me. You see, my dream is to one day…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Onee-chan, please don't be mad at me. You see, my dream is to one day…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: The letter ended abruptly.

The phrase "legendary Uma Sage" confused me, so I decided 
to see if there were any hints left behind on her Umastagram.

There was a picture that was posted a few seconds ago. 
It was a selfie of Curren looking dejected while on 
the way to a remote island. Underneath the picture was…
#AStoneInACreek #UnableToEscapeTheTorrent #ItCan'tHelpButSink
data.name: ＠Curren

data.text:
A mysterious haiku… It seemed to center around 
the word "creek". An intricately written haiku 
about one's downfall hidden amongst hashtags.

What am I doing! I have to go after her! 
I should bring "that" with me too…!

There was no sign of human life on the 
remote island. Is Curren Chan really here…?

As I wandered deeper into the mountains in search of 
Curren Chan I heard the sound of a raging waterfall. Then…

Pain… Only… Helps… To… Further… One's… Progress… On… The… Path… 
Towards… Self… Betterment…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Curren Chan was reciting something that sounded like it came out 
of Buddhist scriptures while sitting under a waterfall…!? 
Regardless, I rushed over and pulled her out…!

Ehehe, you found me… I guess you really are the 
best at finding me when I'm lost, huh, Onee-chan?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Ehehe, you found me… I guess you really are the 
best at finding me when I'm lost, huh, Onee-chan?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
I knew she left clues on her Umasta 
post so that I'd be able to find her.
Okay, that's fine. But what about?
data.name: Curren Chan

choices.text: I want to learn more about you.
I want to learn more about you.

data.text:
The reason I wanted to learn more about 
her is because as of now I know nothing. 
After I said this Curren Chan smiled at me.

Onee-chan, you really want to know the 
reason behind my "cuteness," don't you?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Onee-chan, you really want to know the 
reason behind my "cuteness," don't you?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
But tell me, are you really prepared 
to learn everything about me?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
She looked at me in such a serious manner that I flinched. 
However, if I can't even meet her gaze, I'm not qualified to be 
her trainer. However, if I can't even meet her gaze, I'm not 
qualified to be her trainer.

Hehe… well, guess I've got no choice. 
Then we'll begin from when I was born.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Babies laugh a lot, right? When I 
was a newborn I would laugh a lot too.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
And because of that my family would laugh along with me. They 
would always call me "cute" and looked so happy all of the time.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Onii-san… I mean my real older brother would always tell me 
that my cuteness had the power to make those around me happy.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
So I decided that I'd live my life being "cute". 
I decided that when I was… around 3 years old maybe?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
So in order to become as "cute" as possible I 
decided to do research on "cuteness". As a result 
of my research, I gained many admirers.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
I… Um…! You're the Umastagrammer, 
Curren, aren't you!?
data.name: Curren's Follower

data.text:
You gave me the courage to change myself… 
Curren, you saved me.
data.name: Curren's Follower

data.text:
What she said made me so happy… 
I was able to use my cuteness to 
make people outside of my family happy too.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
I was happy to receive their praise, 
and they were happy because I was cute.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
So I thought that I would continue 
to expand this cycle of happiness!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
I had no idea that the concept of "cuteness" 
had such a deep meaning for her.

choices.text: So why'd you come to this academy?

data.text:
That's because… the Uma Musume from Tracen Academy 
that I saw on TV shined brighter than anyone else.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
They were drenched in sweat, their hair ruined by the wind, 
and were always wearing a stoic, unsmiling expression. 
Honestly, it was a little bit frightening…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
The things I knew, the things I mastered, what 
I believed cuteness to be… They were the exact 
opposite. But, but when I saw those girls race…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
I thought… they were so "cute". 
They shined so brightly!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: If I join Tracen Academy and win races… I could shine just like… No! I could shine even brighter than the girls I saw on TV.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
More people would know about me! 
Not only that, the entire world would fall in love with me!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
But… during the preliminary 
race I betrayed everyone's faith in me…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
When you're cute you have to be perfect. 
If you destroy everyone's dreams… 
you're no longer cute.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
I can't believe that I prepared so poorly that my horseshoe ended 
up falling off. It wasn't cute at all!! It wasn't cute at all!!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
That's why I came here to improve myself! 
I don't want to continue being this worthless Curren!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
I finally figured her out. She's a perfectionist 
struggling to keep up with her ideal self.

Being cute is not something you can achieve in a single day. From 
the tips of her nails to each individual hair on her head, her 
effort to be cute was ever-present.

Her amazing racing ability is no exception. 
There is no way that she could have gotten this good without 
working herself to death, even when no one was around.
And all of this… for the sake of "cuteness…"

Eh? Is that supposed to be a compliment? 
I feel like you're not really praising me.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
But, I guess it's pretty obvious 
that I do really hate it… huh?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
This was the first time that I saw her not as some alien, but as 
a true Uma Musume. And that's when I realized that I truly 
respected her way of life.

As her trainer, there are things I must do. 
I will help her reach the stage that she yearns for!

With more training she will definitely regain the cuteness that 
she had lost. In order to do that I handed her back the horseshoe 
that had come off. In order to do that I handed her back the 
horseshoe that had come off.

choices.text: I found this for you, Princess

data.text: Ehehe… Thank you, Onee-chan.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Ehehe… Thank you, Onee-chan.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
This was the day where I truly became Curren Chan's trainer. And 
as we trained together the legendary Uma Sage smiled down upon us.
